name: zionist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who belongs to or supports a political movement that had as its original aim the creation of a country for Jewish people, and that now supports the state of Israel: My father, who was a Zionist, told my mother on his deathbed to take the family to Israel. See
Zionism

supporting, belonging to, or relating to a political movement that had as its original aim the creation of a country for Jewish people, and that now supports the state of Israel: The two men had belonged to the same Zionist group at Vienna University. See
Zionism
